name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry from Birds Eye®
author: Bird's Eye
summary: A delicious beef and broccoli stir fry is on the table is less than 30 minutes with handy prepared veggies and rice.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless sirloin steak, cut into thin slices
1 (14 ounce) bag Birds Eye® Recipe Ready Broccoli Stir Fry
1 (10 ounce) bag Birds Eye® Steamfresh® Long Grain White Rice, cooked according to package directions*
directions: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and cook steak, stirring frequently, 6 minutes or until almost done
Add Recipe Ready Broccoli Stir Fry and continue cooking, stirring frequently, 4 minutes or until vegetables are tender
Add back steak and stir-fry sauce and cook, stirring frequently, 2 minutes or until heated through
** Serve over prepared rice and sprinkle, if desired, with chopped peanuts
